archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: (Mid) ArcGis Geo-spatial Platform
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Asset creation (in ArcGIS, Oracle CMMS, SCADA monitoring Tool), asset performance monitoring, asset life cycle management, warehouse management The daily tasks of the department are accomplished mainly around the ArcGIS platform, which currently includes functionalities such as RGS, Data viewer, Workflow Management, Utility network. The asset lifecycle process is supported by ESB/BPM Palatform managing the flow/alignment in ERP (Oracle) and Field Management (SCADA systems).
(resources and assets mapping) Master repository
